
name(The Fast & The Furious + The Radical)

snap(-40,-60,50)

sky(255,248,222)
fog(217,250,255) 
ground(205,213,226)
polys(192,198,226) 

fadefrom(7000)
density(4)
lightson()

nlaps(3)

set(47,0,0,250,0)
set(15,0,0,250,0)p
set(15,0,5600,250,0)p

set(10,0,56000,250,180)p
set(10,0,61600,250,180)p
set(10,0,67200,250,180)p
